nodes.text: Gungan bouillabaisse was a very strong and thick soup named after the amphibian Gungans of the planet Naboo. During the Battle of Drongar of the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Sullustan reporter Den Dhur compared the smell of a cantina on the planet Drongar to that of Gungan bouillabaisse. He once again recognized the smell at the Ploughtekal Market on the planet Coruscant.
The soup was first mentioned in MedStar II: Jedi Healer, a novel written by Steve Perry and Michael Reaves, which was published in 2004.
